audio_sermons.title: (Youth Bible School 2007) Christ Is the Believer's Goal
audio_sermons.description: Christ is our benevolent Despot! As we celebrate our Monarch, our lives will assimilate His. Things and earthly pressures no longer dominate our lives. The athlete casts away the baggage of unforgiveness and the pain of being misused and runs for the Person who set the race in motion.

audio_sermons.title: (Youth Bible School 2007) Christ Is the Believer's Life
audio_sermons.description: Paul presents to the Philippians the life of always rejoicing. The motivation to please the coach, the fellowship of working as partners for the same cause, the supernatural characteristics of God made accessible to limited humans, combined into one life, result in an overflowing, vibrant life of supreme commitment.

audio_sermons.title: (Youth Bible School 2007) Christ Is the Believer's Mind
audio_sermons.description: Sorrow defines the difference between happiness and joy. Happiness is dependent on circumstances. Joy is strengthened in sorrow because it corresponds with the grace God supplies. Christ calls us to follow Him in His descent from the absolute top to the absolute bottom with HIM as our Life. Division cannot penetrate the ranks of the Lord's army.

audio_sermons.title: (Youth Bible School 2007) Christ Is the Believer's Song
audio_sermons.description: Music deserves much greater recognition than we often give it in our spiritual experience. It is an imperative for the child of God and offers an abundant store of potential to be discovered. Quality music will stand the test of time by its very composition.

audio_sermons.title: (Youth Bible School 2007) Christ Is the Believer's Strength
audio_sermons.description: Gentle moderation portrays Christ-likeness in our relationships. Earnest prayers relieve our personal anxieties. Guarded and directed thoughts shape our character. Constant celebration of King Jesus crowns our entire lives.

audio_sermons.title: Embracing the Gospel of the Kingdom
Recognizing the New Song—Part 2
audio_sermons.description: This messages is a good education in recognizing good and bad music. The gospel of Jesus Christ and entertainment do not go together. Learn to recognize whether what you, your family and church are singing is of worth to the Lord.

audio_sermons.title: Sing the New Song—Part 1
audio_sermons.description: A converted person will sing a NEW song. A song with the message of Christ's deliverance! This message educates and inspires our heart to understand the passion in God's heart for good music. Since music brings us into the supernatural it is imperative that we are very sensitive to what music we are listening to and what we are singing.
